Which type of business do you want to do?

  • Which type of BD transaction do you want to do?

    • Open a New BD Account
    • Start a New BD Transaction
    • Move BD Account

    • Which custodian do you use?

      • NFS
      • TDA
      • Schwab
      • Fidelity IWS
      • TPMR
      • No Custodian (Held Direct)

      • Has the client filed an ANAF in the past 2 years?

        • Yes
        • No

        • Is this an alternative investment? If so, what type?

          • Private Placement
          • REIT
          • Energy Private Placement
          • Complex Products
          • Affiliated Offerings
          • Third Party Money Managers
          • Not an alternative investment

            • List of forms you need

            • Remember, always have the OFAC check and driver's license

    • 1035 Exchange or Insurance Surrender

      • Yes
      • No

        • Yes
        • No
